entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 12:42 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
